title: New: Camp Counselors – 02​/​05​/​11 / Oslo
content: Having appeared little under a year ago with a duo of debut tracks, both which have since vanished from the internet, Buffalo’s Camp Counselors has returned, with another two gems, as well as unveiling his identity. Kyle J. Reigle, the individual behind Camp Counselors, has worked with Warren Hildebrand (better known as Foxes in Fiction), for this digital 7″. Comprised of 02​/​05​/​11 and the instrumental track Oslo, it’s a dreamy, slightly distant release; absorbing yet also existing solely within its own consciousness. 02​/​05​/​11 burns slowly, as extra layers of vocals, and then percussion gradually seep in, whereas Oslo adopts a more post-rock inspired feel, toying with atmosphere to sublime effect. Check both out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
